translations.en:
: ** During the Christmas holidays, you didnâ€™t rest a lot. However, it doesn't make you forget your primary goal: finding the princess. Even on this December night, you continue your journey through the alleys of a huge city. In the darkness, you see a man dressed in red getting out of his car, carried by many horses... With horns... Deers?

:wave: Call the man and approach him
:eyes: Blink your eyes because you don't feel like you can see well
:leftwards_arrow_with_hook: Turn around : you don't want to take any risks with your fatigue

*-Use the reactions to take an action. :warning: Not reacting is also considered a choice!*

translations.en: ** | :wave: You start to call him, quite moderately though, because it's late. He immediately gets back in his car and flies away... Flies away ? Perhaps itâ€™s time to sleep, what you are about to do in a nearby inn. How surprised you were to see a present near your bed when you woke up !

translations.en: ** | â†©ï¸ You turn around: your past experiences have taught you that danger can be anywhere! As you are about to leave your alley, you hear someone shouting "Ho Ho Ho Ho" behind you. You turn around, however, there's only a gift left at your feet.
